pageTitle: Chapter 4 Configuration Worksheets (Sun Java Enterprise System 5 Update 1 Installation Reference for UNIX)
textBeforeTable: Table 4–1 Common Server Settings Configuration Worksheet For detailed explanations of the fields in this worksheet, refer to the tables under Common Server Settings Common Settings Configuration Information Parameters Used Only in State Files Configuration Information Web Server Configuration Information Web Proxy Server Configuration Information Portal Server Secure Remote Access Configuration Information Portal Server Configuration Information HADB Configuration Information Directory Server Configuration Information Application Server Configuration Information Access Manager SDK Configuration Information Access Manager Configuration Information Common Settings Configuration Information This chapter contains the following sections: This chapter contains the worksheets for gathering configuration information that is required during a Configure Now installation. These worksheets are companion tools for working with the configuration information in Chapter 3, Configuration Information. Worksheets are included only for the product components that can be configured by the Sun JavaTM Enterprise System (Java ES) installer. Chapter 4 Configuration Worksheets Next: Chapter 5 List of Installable Packages Previous: Chapter 3 Configuration Information
textAfterTable: System Group  CMN_SYSTEM_GROUP Your data: _____________________________________________________  The default value is root. Access Manager Configuration Information This section contains worksheets for the following topics: Access Manager Administration Web Container Access Manager Services Access Manager Directory Server Access Manager Provisioned Directory Access Manager Administration For detailed explanations of the fields in this worksheet, refer to the tables under Access Manager Administration Information. Table 4–2 Access Manager Administration Information Configuration Worksheet Label and State File Parameter  Data  Install type  AM_REALM Your data: _____________________________________________________  Legacy mode used by default.  Administrator User ID  IS_ADMIN_USER_ID Your data: amadmin Cannot be changed.  Administrator Password  IS_ADMINPASSWD Your data: _____________________________________________________  (must be at least eight characters)  LDAP User ID  IS_LDAP_USER Your data: amldapuser Cannot be changed.
